Name: La Tour Eiffel
Ingredients: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet cognac-influenced palate with lingering flavours of liquorice root, honey, pine and eucalyptus from the Suze.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2007 by Gary "gaz" Regan after a Sazerac -fuelled trip to New Orleans. He was inspired by how the Sazerac might have been if it had originally been created in France rather than New Orleans.
Nutrition: One serving of La Tour Eiffel contains 231 calories
